sen.e: On January 3, 1868, due to the coup of Daigorei of Oseifukko (restoration of imperial rule) after Taiseihokan (restoration of imperial rule) implemented in October in this year, the Satsuma clan and the Choshu clan established the right to rule Kyoto and, therefore, the Kyoto Shugoshoku was abolished six years after its foundation.
